author: Andrew Liptak
title: Star Wars inspired Mandalorian fans, then Mandalorian fans inspired Star Wars
description: Boba Fett captured the imaginations of Star Wars fans after Empire Strikes Back, but Mandalorian mania really took off after the prequels. Groups like the 501st Legion and Mandalorian Mercs made customized armor, mask, and weapon cosplay that expanded the his…
content: On the final day of the 2019 Star Wars Celebration, Jon Favreau took the stage to present the first-ever footage of the first-ever live-action Star Wars TV series, The Mandalorian. But before the sizzle reel rolled, the Iron Man director pointed out into the … [+18571 chars]
